summary: The diff shows that backend/main.mo was modified to include some vocabulary words, but the implementation falls significantly short of the requirement to populate exactly 3000 GRE words. The diff is truncated, showing only approximately 14-15 words before being cut off. The requirement explicitly states 3000 words must be populated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend contains exactly 3000 GRE vocabulary words
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the vocabulary list in backend/main.mo contains only approximately 14-15 words (Aberration through Obfuscate) before being truncated. Even accounting for potential truncation, there is no evidence of 3000 words being populated. The acceptance criteria explicitly requires exactly 3000 words.
